thread.title: ‘Nobody Has Sourced It’: Kellyanne Conway Answers Seth Myers on Newest Russia/Trump Report
thread.title_full: ‘Nobody Has Sourced It’: Kellyanne Conway Answers Seth Myers on Newest Russia/Trump Report

author: Justin Baragona
title: ‘Nobody Has Sourced It’: Kellyanne Conway Answers Seth Myers on Newest Russia/Trump Report
text:
‘Nobody Has Sourced It’: Kellyanne Conway Answers Seth Myers on Newest Russia/Trump Report   11:09   Video 
This evening, Kellyanne Conway was questioned by Seth Myers on the latest report from CNN that alleges President-elect Donald Trump was presented with information from intelligence chiefs that Russia attempted to compromise him. CNN’s report was followed by Buzzfeed’s release of a secret dossier that is reportedly the basis of the two-page synopsis given to Trump during last week’s intelligence briefing. 
Speaking to the Late Night with Seth Myers host, Conway insisted that Trump had already told her that he was unaware of the additional document. 
“He has said that he is not aware of that,” Conway said. She also pointed out that “nobody has sourced” the report, slamming the report for using “unspoken sources in the story.” 
Further, she blamed Hillary Clinton, stating that the story indicated groups that wanted her to win “may have been behind the investigations themselves” and that the FBI is trying to confirm it. The incoming presidential counselor added that she was concerned about intelligence officials leaking to the press. 
Following the release of the report, Trump tweeted out a response , calling it “fake news” and a “political witch hunt.” 
Watch the clip above, via Late Night with Seth Myers .
